section.name: Introduction
section.p: Currently deploying a server application under Loom is simply a matter of dropping the .sar file into the appropriate directory (apps/).
If the hot deployment monitor is enabled (default), applications can be added, removed and updated in the apps/ directory without restarting Loom.

subsection.name: Target Audience
subsection.p: This documentation describes the methods through which you can deploy Server Applications under the Loom kernel. It will be expanded as the system becomes more complete.
